simple-socket library Documentation

An easy to use C++ socket and network library, mainly for UNIX systems.

Overview

The following features are currently available:

  • Streams (TCP) and Datagrams (UDP)
  • IPv4 and Unix Domain Sockets
  • SCTP Protocol support
  • UDP Multicast
  • Reentrant and Signal Safe
